row.process: : SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#) : SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#,&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,OVERWRITE) : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : IF &RET# > 0 : PRINT "Error in writing file to path : &UC4RB_FILE_PATH#" : STOP MSG, 50, "Error writing file." : ENDIF
